content.question: The drive-reduction theory of motivation can be used to account for which of the following?

choices.label: The tendency to affiliate with others in order to enhance the likelihood of survival
The need to sleep after a period of sleep deprivation
The desire to go skydiving or engage in other behaviors that produce an adrenaline rush

content.answer: The need to sleep after a period of sleep deprivation
